thread.title: Dustin Hoffman’s wife Lisa headed to Australia to promote range of fragrances on TVSN
thread.title_full: Dustin Hoffman’s wife Lisa headed to Australia to promote range of fragrances on TVSN | DailyTelegraph

author: dailytelegraph.com
title: Dustin Hoffman’s wife Lisa headed to Australia to promote range of fragrances on TVSN
text:
LISA Hoffman — the businesswoman wife of Hollywood actor Dustin — is headed our way. Hoffman has signed off on a trip Down Under for TVSN, launching her fragrance collection through the network next month.
“This collection is very dear to me and everyone involved, and we can’t wait to see the reaction it receives,” said Hoffman.
“Fragrance is the most personal thing you can wear and our goal is to let women choose how and when they want to wear it.”
News_Image_File: American business woman and wife of actor Dustin, Lisa Hoffman.
Hoffman, 61, is the founder of Lisa Hoffman Beauty and married Dustin, 78, in 1980.

Opinion 0 comments Robert Irwin’s animal instinct Celebrity The pair have four children together.
She will appear live on TVSN in the week starting November 1, as well as attending a media lunch event on the 5th of the month.
Originally published as Lisa Hoffman is scent to Sydney
